wordGroup: factual knowledge 事实知识；事实性知识

sentences.en: The editorial contained several factual errors.
sentences.cn: 这篇社论有几处事实性错误。

sentences.en: Factual and forensic evidence makes a suicide verdict the most compelling answer to the mystery of his death.
sentences.cn: 事实和法庭证据使自杀的判定成为对他死亡之谜最令人信服的解答。

sentences.en: These methods can be classified into three types of informational writing: factual, descriptive and process.
sentences.cn: 这些方法可分为三类信息写作：事实性、描述性和过程性。
